post.author: Admin
post.title: Support the School Bond Issue with a Yard Sign
post.description:
Hello Band Families!
The team for the North Royalton Bond Issue is asking all Band families to con
post.content:
Hello Band Families!

The team for the North Royalton Bond Issue is asking all Band families to consider placing a sign in their yard in support of the issue.

Signs can be picked up at any school building or at the central office. In addition, if you email: nrbondissue@gmail.com with your address, a sign will be delivered to you!

Thank you in advance for your support of the bond issue for our schools.
